data.title: Deadly Sky: The American Combat Airman in World War II
data.meta_description: Deadly Sky: The American Combat Airman in World War II by McManus, John; McManus, John C. - ISBN 10: 0891416781 - ISBN 13: 9780891416784 - Presidio Press - 2000 - Hardcover
data.text:
McManus, John

Published by Brand: Presidio Press, 2000

ISBN 10: 0891416781 / ISBN 13: 9780891416784

Used / Hardcover

Quantity: 1 available

Seller: Ergodebooks, Houston, TX, U.S.A.

Seller Rating:

Hardcover. Condition: Good. Moving past the romance and myth of military aviation, the author reveals the dangerous and often fatal business of flying bombers and fighter planes over enemy territory during World War II--a conflict that saw 120,000 casualties among American aviators, 40,000 of them fatal.
